title: Forearm and Hand of Statuette
description:
Painted wooden right hand with forearm from a small statue of a man. Preserved to elbow only. Painted dark red. Finger extended straight, thumb curved. Apparently was joined to separate piece at elbow.
Condition: Spilt on inner side from palm to upper forearm.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
